title: Technical Architect , Teamcenter
tagsAndSkills: IT services,Technical Architect,MS SQL,SAP,project support,Configuration management,devops,Problem management
jobDescription:
• We are looking for Technical Architect PDM/PLM Operations & Maintenance for our PDM/PLM system (Teamcenter), responsible for Infrastructure, Technical Architecture, Capacity Management, Configuration Management, Performance Management, Monitoring Management, DevOps practices, CI/CD Process, Change Development & Project Support Problem Management, Infrastructure, DevOps practices and improving performance for our Teamcenter PLM platform operations & maintenance.

    Location : Navi Mumbai, India

    Responsibilities
  • Exploring and developing Automations for PDM/PLM platform.
  • Problem Management and Level 3 support.
  • Configuring & Administration of Teamcenter.
  • Adopting DevOps tools and methodology.
  • Implementing Cloud in PLM Infrastructure as per future Architecture.
  • To execute the operational DevOps tasks and to support the projects as needed.
  • Manage changes, new requirements, development and documentation within own functional area.
  • Communicate with and inform relevant stakeholders concerning changes.
  • By following directions and framework set, provide a significant contribution as a subject matter expert for development & continuous service improvements.
Qualification Criteria

As a successful candidate, you should have
  • Education: M.Sc., Graduate in Information Technology, Engineering or Sciences
  • Has 8+ years experience in Administering large Enterprise-wide Siemens Teamcenter and infrastructure setup- 3
  • Experience in requirement management & Service design methodology
  • Experience in managing MS SQL Database and performance optimization for Teamcenter database- 4
  • Good exposure on Monitoring tools like SentryOne, Nagios etc.
  • Strong knowledge of Teamcenter infrastructure - 1
  • Experience in development methodology for managing CI/CD pipeline- 2
  • Experience in DevOps & Agile methodology
  • Expertise in BMIDE deployments
  • Has strong communication, presentation, and personal skills
  • Has fluent written and spoken English
  • Is willing to travel
  • Proactive, systematic, development-minded and goal-focused attitude
  • Excellent problem solving & analytic skills
  • Fluent written and spoken English

title: Hybrid Developer
tagsAndSkills: Interpersonal skills,Automation testing,Publishing,Mobile development,Debugging,Architectural design,Manager Technology,Open source
jobDescription:
Has production experience using hybrid mobile development platforms using React Native
• Experience in building mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms
• Experience in publishing apps in both play store and app store
• Experience in Ionic
• Experience in interactive mobile UI using hybrid app development
• Well aware to build cross platform iOS / Android applications and to architect and maintain excellent hybrid applications with clean code
• Having knowledge of third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts that might occur.
• Capability to take advantage of native APIs for deep integration of all platforms.
• Experience with financial product architecture designing, aligning with new technologies.
• Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
• Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
• Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.
• Reach out to the open source community to encourage and help implement mission-critical software fixes—React Native moves fast and often breaks things.
• Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
• Transition existing React web apps to React Native.
• Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage
• Experience with automated testing suites
• Experience in firebase

title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
Shift Timings: Overlapping shift depending on client geography

Experience Required: 3 years and above

Educational Qualification: B.E./B.Tech/MCA

Who you are:

  • As a developer, you have a passion for development and a thirst to learn. You enjoy working in a fast- paced and dynamic environment. You are a quick learner who can step up and take ownership of work to get things done on time. You also enjoy and appreciate working and collaborating with others from various backgrounds as part of a team.

Good to Have Skills:

  • Proficient in : Kotlin, Android SDK, Android Jetpack libraries, OOPs, Reactive Programming.
  • Have published at list one application on the Google Play store. Have CI/CD pipeline knowledge.
  • Well versed in writing Unit testing(JUnit, Mockito etc)
  • Proven work experience in mobile architecture using frameworks such as MVVM/MVP
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git/Bitbucket and Jira for project management.
  • Familiarity with Android Material Design

Other Skills:

  • Good with documentation & likes to upskill self
  • Must have exposure in all the phases of SDLC (Requirement understanding, Development, Deployment & Support)
  • Good agile understanding
  • Worked on legacy code and reverse engineering
  • Good with design patterns.

Principal Accountabilities:

  • Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
  • Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
  • Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
  • Advocates Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • A knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Stays in touch with The TEAM via main preferred channels, ie. Telegram, email and mobile.
  • Demonstrates expertise and leadership in Android development.
  • Deliver assigned task based on requirement specifications
  • Ensure quality of code
  • Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes;
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the library understanding of code versioning tools, sues available for common tasks
  • Proficient as Git
  • Familiarity with project management tools, such as JIRA
  • Familiarity with continuous integration

Our Selection Process:

The selection process will compriseof:

  • Technical Interaction 1
  • Technical Interaction 2
  • HR & Organizational Alignment Discussion
